webscript.description: Send signed content to partner Input JSON Object { "content": ["workspace://SpacesStore/1", "workspace://SpacesStore/2", ...], "partner": "workspace://SpacesStore/12345", "interactionType": "SPECOP"|"EMAIL", "email": "partner@mail.com" } required param "content": json array of content's nodeRefs. This content will be send to partner optional param "partner": outer partner, who will receive signed content optional param "interactionType": how to interact with partner, using specop or simple email optional param "email": partner's email. Will be used if defined
